QuestData.Title: Hodir's Sigil
QuestData.Description: Hodir's Sigil won't be easy to obtain. Not only are ye going to have to defeat Hodir himself, but yer going to have to do it before he destroys the chest that contains it!$B$BCheck the Archivum console if you need more information. That thing contains more knowledge than all of the world's libraries put together!
QuestData.LogDescription: Prospector Doren at the Archivum in Ulduar wants you to obtain Hodir's Sigil.$B$BFor more information on obtaining Hodir's Sigil, consult the Archivum Console.
QuestData.RewardText: Ye did it! I don't know how, but ye did!
